name: Martian Entomophobia (3D FPS project)
description:
Changes:

-Added characters (one is the player character, the other is just for dialog purposes)

-Added a short-story thing (explained in the character description in the main menu)

-Changed the main menu a bit

-Made different models for the guns, and also the player pistol with replaced with something else(guns in-game: Battle Rifle, pump-shotgun, railgun)

-Added another type of enemy(mutated enemies at the end of level1)

Credits:

-Le Hong Nhat Minh

-Assets from MSU GEL Lab

What I used:

-Photoshop to make the cover

-Gacha Club(A dress-up game) to make the characters

-Unity

Note: for some reason when I click the expand button in the WebGL build, it kinda breaks, check it using the downloads if possible
